name: UBC Course Schedule Creator
description: A website that offers UBC students all the possible schedules that can be made, given the courses they wish to take.

name: Spotty
description: Do you have parking space you never use? Spotty can help advertise this space for you and help other drivers who are looking for parking. Using IoT, Spotty can use cameras and sensors to provide automated security, and status of your parking space ensuring that your property is safe.
technologies: Hardware (Raspberry Pi, Orange Pi Zero, Amazon Alexa, cameras, ultrasonic sensors, temperature sensors

name: Review Me
description: Automatic notifications to remind PR reviewers, multi-repo issue list, and slack notifications for unread Github notifications for better productivity.
technologies: AWS (EC2, SNS, SQS, SMS, SES, S3, DynamoDB)

name: Simply Do
description: A todo list Web Application hosted on Heroku.

name: Check It
description: A real-time collaborative, sharable and reusable checklist for any platform.

name: Speed Passive Reading (VR)
description: An application to make reading interesting, efficent and faster using passive reading -- displaying words one at a time in a fixed space.

name: Sleep Social
description: iOS application to track sleep time, set up sleep goals, get rewarded for achieving goals, share your progress and see how your friends are doing.

name: Food Shake
description: Android Application to solve “Where should we eat?” situations by randomly selecting a nearby restaurant on phone shake.

name: Desktop Launcher
description: Toy turret that can rotate, take photos and shoot projectiles for technology enthusiasts. Optionally controlled through the Desktop Launcher mobile application.

name: UBC Snowbots
description: Autonomous robot that navigates through an obstacle course for the Intelligent Ground Vehicle Competition.

name: Internet Connected Baby Monitor
description: IoT baby monitor powered by Raspberry Pi and Arduino.

name: Arduino-Based Autonomous Robot
description: Autonomous robot that explores the world and follow black lines that can also be controlled by a mobile device.

name: Morse Code with Arduino
description: Java application that stores samples of Yelp's Academic Datasheet in JSON and returns data given a query.

name: Restaurant Database
description: Java application that stores samples of Yelp's Academic Datasheet in JSON and returns data given a query.

name: RISC Machine
description: Simple RISC machine with arithmetic, memory instructions and branching.

name: Pong
description: Displayed via HTML5's Canvas and implemented in Javascript.

name: Cabin Escape
description: 3D first person escape the room puzzle game created in Unity.

name: Don't Burn Your Friends
description: 2D point-and-click adventure game created in Unity.

name: Happy Claws
description: Virtual claw machine game created in Unity.

name: Blackjack
description: A desktop application to play Blackjack -- implemented in Java using JavaFX for GUI.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: Implemented in Verilog.

name: Simon Game
description: Implemented in C and emulate hardware using DAQ Library.
